amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 119-445 to prohibit funding for the National Endowment for Democracy.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the National Endowment for Democracy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 291 (Roll no. 27).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 291 (Roll no. 27).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
